sqlMap.select: select g.year,m.semester,s.code,s.sub,s.division checked,s.professor, g.grade from member m, subject s, grade_info g where s.code=g.code and m.id=g.id and m.id=#id# order by g.year, m.semester
select s.sub from subject s, member m where m.name=s.professor and m.name=#name# and m.id=#id# and year=#year# and division=#checked#

select m.semester, m.dept, m.id, m.name, g.grade,g.code from grade_info g, member m, subject s where s.professor=#professor# and g.year=#year# and g.semester=#semester# and s.sub=#sub# and s.division=#checked# and m.id=g.id and g.code=s.code
sqlMap.update: update grade_info set grade=#grade# where code=#code# and year=#year# and semester=#semester# and id=#id#
